title: Update `.git-blame-ignore-revs` description
author: adi-ray
details: Updated documentation for `.git-blame-ignore-revs` to clarify that it excludes commits introducing new lines **or modifying existing lines** (previously only specified "introduced new lines")
Maintained note that the last commit modifying a line remains visible in blame views
